title: Mid level Laravel Developer
description:
Description

Mid level Laravel Developer

Templatecookie.

Dhaka, Bangladesh

Full-time

Full Job Description
Who Are We?

Wide Open Technologies is a Dhaka, Bangladesh based Design, Marketing and Custom Development agency. We are looking for another great Software Developer to join our team.

Who We Are Looking For:

We need someone who is able to work on multiple projects without hand holding, be a team player who wants to work remotely but also be active in our company culture, values a good work/life balance and believes in getting results.

We build technology solutions for small and medium sized businesses which means you will get to work on a wide range of technologies including single page web applications, complex systems integration and large-scale eCommerce deployments.

Requirements:
  • Experience building real-world PHP applications
  • Extensive use of Laravel
  • Experience with configuring and managing infrastructure in AWS
  • Strong front end programming skills (HTML5, CSS, Javascript)
  • Experience with VueJs
  • Understanding of UI/UX design principles
  • Comfortable with command line Linux and/or OSX
  • Experience with Git version control
  • Good attitude and willingness to learn – We are a drama-free zone!

Our priority is hiring the best people, so as long as you cross over on EST for at least 4 hrs. a day and meet the above description we will consider you!

Job Types: Full-time
Experience:
  • php: 2 years
  • laravel: 2 years
  • vuejs: 2 years
Education:
  • Bachelors Degree (Preferred)
Work Location:
  • Dhaka
Hours per week:
  • ~40 Hours
Visa Sponsorship Potentially Available:
  • No: Not providing sponsorship for this job
This Job Is Ideal for Someone Who Is:
  • Good Communicator—has good communication skills
  • Dependable -- more reliable than spontaneous
  • Adaptable/flexible -- enjoys doing work that requires frequent shifts in direction
  • Detail-oriented -- would rather focus on the details of work than the bigger picture
  • Autonomous/Independent -- enjoys working with little direction
  • Innovative -- prefers working in unconventional ways or on tasks that require creativity
Schedule:
  • Monday to Friday
Company's website:
  • https://templatecookie.com

Pay: From $35,000.00 per year

Benefits:
  • Dental insurance
  • Flexible schedule
  • Health insurance
  • Paid time off
  • Vision insurance
Schedule:
  • Monday to Friday
Experience:
  • Laravel: 2 years (Required)
  • PHP: 2 years (Required)
Language:
  • English (Required)
Work Location:
  • Remote

title: Expert React JS Developer
description:
Description

Expert React JS Developer

Templatecookie.

Dhaka, Bangladesh

Full-time

Experience
  • php, 2 years
  • laravel, 2 years
  • vuejs, 2 years
Full Job Description
Who Are We?

Wide Open Technologies is a Dhaka, Bangladesh based Design, Marketing and Custom Development agency. We are looking for another great Software Developer to join our team.

Who We Are Looking For:

We need someone who is able to work on multiple projects without hand holding, be a team player who wants to work remotely but also be active in our company culture, values a good work/life balance and believes in getting results.

We build technology solutions for small and medium sized businesses which means you will get to work on a wide range of technologies including single page web applications, complex systems integration and large-scale eCommerce deployments.

Requirements:
  • Experience building real-world PHP applications
  • Extensive use of Laravel
  • Experience with configuring and managing infrastructure in AWS
  • Strong front end programming skills (HTML5, CSS, Javascript)
  • Experience with VueJs
  • Understanding of UI/UX design principles
  • Comfortable with command line Linux and/or OSX
  • Experience with Git version control
  • Good attitude and willingness to learn – We are a drama-free zone!

Our priority is hiring the best people, so as long as you cross over on EST for at least 4 hrs. a day and meet the above description we will consider you!
